item.title: How To Trade Forex Market Structures And Patterns
item.description: Discover the secrets to trading profitably and consistently for maximum profits. This course contains powerful information that can guide you on how to exploit patterns that arise now and then in the markets. Discover when and where to trade, and when and where not to trade. Thank you for joining our course because you are about to gain more knowledge about the formation of classic forex chart patterns and structures. It is true that they are valid and do indeed work; provided that they are used properly, at the appropriate price levels, and with the correct knowledge.

item.title: Fundamentals of Hedge Funds
item.description: WHY HEDGE FUNDS? Hedge funds are one of the most profitable types of alternative assets. However, they are not easy to comprehend. Fund structures, investment strategies, provisions and fees, and other elements. And unfortunately, it's hard to find a course that covers the essentials of hedge funds. So it becomes common for a student to: Not be able to discern among the different investment strategies; Not know if the provisions negotiated with an investor are helpful to the fund, or not at all;

item.title: Fundamentals of Private Equity
item.description: PRIVATE EQUITY, PRIVATE KNOWLEDGE The PE industry is one of the most lucrative ones. It's also complex to understand, if you don't have the right guide. A lot of techniques, knowledge and hands-on tips are not usually shared. Usually, what would find would be generic courses with theoretical materials in terms of valuations or general job descriptions, not going into the details of fund operations, the job, or other elements.

Most times it gets confusing trying to figure out which pattern is which or what the overall trend in the market is, but I am here to eliminate all of that.

item.title: Stock Trading Momentum Based Strategies1- Technical Analysis
item.description: In this course we will discuss multiple momentum oscillator, which measures both the speed as well as the rise or fall of price movements of a stocks. Relative Strength Index (or RSI), Stoch, William %R, TSI & MFL are one of the top Technical Analysis Indicator. In this Course these technical indicators are not only shown as merely a indicator but a Complete System for trading. RSI, Stoch, William %R, TSI & MFL is used by professional to identify the trend, Selling or Buying conditions through Reversal, divergences or simple Buy and sell techniques.

item.title: Calcul stochastique pour le trading Forex
item.description: Aujourd'hui, Médaillon, le fond le plus profitable du monde fait en moyenne plus de 60% de gain annuel. Mais comment? Ils sont spécialiser dans la finance quantitative, le trading algorithmique et la mathématisation des processus financier. Ici, dans cette formation, nous allons nous intéresser au calcul stochastique. Nous allons voir qu'elles sont les méthodes de bases du calcul stochastique, voir comment l'appliquer au indice boursier et au forex. L'idée principale de cette formation est de voir les bénéfices que l'on peut avoir en combinant deux disciplines très utilisées en finance quantitative: le calcul stochastique et le machine learning.

item.title: MASTERCLASS: 'Inversión en Fondos Mutuos'
item.description: Si usted considera que los métodos tradicionales de ahorro que le ofrecen las entidades bancarias de su país no son lo suficientemente buenas para usted debido a su baja rentabilidad y a la creciente inflación, pero a su vez considera que aún no está preparado para dar el gran salto a las inversiones en las bolsas de valores, puesto que ha oído hablar de que es muy riesgoso y que requiere de mucha preparación, entonces esta Masterclass gratuita es adecuada para usted, mi nombre es Jean Pierre Chayña Salas (Economista de profesión) y le mostraré que es posible invertir y sacarle dinero al mercado financiero de forma indirecta jugando bajo sus propios términos y condiciones, aprovechando los beneficios de la banca tradicional y del mercado de valores a través de su banca por Internet BBVA y todo esto desde la comodidad de su casa y ¿Cómo lo haremos?

item.title: Aprende las bases para invertir en la bolsa
item.description: En este curso aprenderás a leer los 3 estados financieros más importantes que reportan las empresas que cotizan en la bolsa americana (empresas públicas.) Estos son el estado de ingresos, la hoja de balance y el flujo de caja. Con el conocimiento ganado podrás reconocer si ha mejorado o empeorado el desempeño de una empresa pública. De esta forma, sabrás si es conveniente invertir en la empresa analizada. Estaremos usando Yahoo Finanzas para analizar los estados financieros.

item.title: Futures Trading Mastery 2021 | FREE Top 45 Trading Signals!

Start a lucrative and sustainable trading business today with this complete A-Z guide designed to help everyone from beginners to existing traders looking to increase profits.
